# attachment

**Instance Property**

The object that defines how the virtual network device communicates with the host system.

## Declaration

```swift
var attachment: VZNetworkDeviceAttachment? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `nil`. Assign an appropriate value to specify the type of network interface you want to make available to the guest operating system. For example, assign a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZBridgedNetworkDeviceAttachment] object to grant access to one of the host computer’s physical network interfaces.



## Setting configuration attributes

- **macAddress**: The media access control (MAC) address to assign to the network device.
